CIRCULAR NO . 15 /  2003 
 
 
Sub: Airport access for Honourable Members of Parliament upto departure and 
arrival area. 
 
It has come to notice that Honourable Members of Parliament are not 
being allowed to gain access upto departure and arrival area of airports on the 
basis of their Identity Card by the airport security personnel. 
 
As per instructions in-force the Honourable Members of Parliament  are 
entitled to gain entry to the departure and arrival area of civil airports in the 
country on the authority of their valid Identity Card issued by Parliament Sectt, 
New Delhi.  
 
It is, therefore, reiterated that all concerned security staff deployed at 
airports in the country may be suitably briefed and advised to honour the Identity 
Cards of Honourable Members of Parliament. They should show due courtesy 
and behave in a polite manner with the Honourable Members of Parliament. 
 
All airport in-charge/ airport security units and Airport Directors may 
ensure compliance of this circular. 
  
 
(R.K.  Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of  Security (CA) 
 
 
 
Ref : No. CAS-10(3) 2003-Div-1  dated 16June 2003
